dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: Mission has started.

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: hello. Whats our mission this time?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: we have a difficult one ahead of us this time builder. bear with me

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: describe the structure?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: we will start using red blocks. if you recall from our previous mission we built an open 3x3 square as the second level of our "table

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: this shape is now extending upwards instead of laying flat

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: okay

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: sort of like a window

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: can i build anywhere?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: yes i think that will work

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: now please place a red block on the left and right sides of the window, in the middle of each side

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: these ones?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: yes place them adjacent to those you just removed

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: perfect

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: the second half of this structure is the same using purple blocks, but oriented differently. i will attempt to start you off step by step though

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: so parallel?

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: or perpendicular?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: it is attached to our current structure sort of parallel and rotated 90 degrees. anyway please place the first purple block on the rightmost red block

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: is it connected?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: not quite

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: its as if they were laying side by side and the purple one gets tilted up 90 degrees so it faces the sky

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: oh so its on the ground?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: we can start off with the first few blocks and you will see soon

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: the first purple block needs to be attached to the rightmost block, so that it hangs in the air and is closer to you

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: here?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: if you move that block to the other side of that red block so that it is on your side and not just an extension

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: yes

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: is this the arm of the window?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: nowplease make the open square (window) on top of that new purple block

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: yes it is

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: is this good?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: ok builder i have bad news but it's an easy fix

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: i gave you the wrong side

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: on the back or other side?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: if you could do that exact structure so that its on the left side of the red square from where you were standing it will be correct

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: here?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: yes

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: is this it?

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: good job builder, i am sorry for the incorrect instructions

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: that is correct

dialogue.speaker: Builder
dialogue.text: you did a good job!

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: thank you for being my builder
